issue.title: answers.gazebosim.org login using social account is not working

content.raw:
> Have you tried logging in using your current username and password?

I tried to type in my account name(s) but couldn't login with them. I think because using social account I might haven't set password on answers.gazebo.org.

> Since a few days ago I started getting OpenID http://yahoo.com is invalid that keeps me from logging in.

By using email recovery option, I'm now able to logon with my yahoo account. I'm not sure how [this upstream comment from Evgeny](http://askbot.org/en/question/14707/openid-invalid-httpyahoocom-error-at-multiple-sites/) related (answers.gazebo.org seems to be installed standalone, instead of hosted service?)

I guess there's no hope for google's account to be recovered but at least some socials are working so I close this.
content.html:
Have you tried logging in using your current username and password?

I tried to type in my account name(s) but couldn't login with them. I think because using social account I might haven't set password on answers.gazebo.org.

Since a few days ago I started getting OpenID http://yahoo.com is invalid that keeps me from logging in.

By using email recovery option, I'm now able to logon with my yahoo account. I'm not sure how this upstream comment from Evgeny related (answers.gazebo.org seems to be installed standalone, instead of hosted service?)

I guess there's no hope for google's account to be recovered but at least some socials are working so I close this.
